body.name: Lee Women's Mid Rise Boyfriend Jean
features: BOYFRIEND JEANS. Complete comfort meets Legendary style in our women's boyfriend jeans. With a mid-rise and worn-in feel, throw on these jeans for a classic, laid-back look.
LEGENDARY DETAILS. Make a statement in these denim jeans finished with our iconic spade hip pocket, logo hardware and patch that make Lee jeans unique.
STRETCH DENIM. Strut with confidence in these everyday jeans. Made from authentic stretch denim, they move with you for all-day comfort.

A LIFETIME OF QUALITY. For over 100 years, Lee has produced quality apparel with durability and long-lasting construction in mind. Lee is committed to designing clothing that conforms to your body, allowing you to move through life freely.
SPECIFICATIONS. (5) Pockets. Zipper fly with button closure. Inseam: 28-inch rolled, 30-inch unrolled. Leg Opening: 16-inch. Rise: 9.5-inch. Destruction details vary by colorway.
body.description: Lee is an iconic American denim and casual apparel brand that's been making legendary product for legendary people since 1889. With over 125 years of purposeful design and craftsmanship, we know a thing or two about style. Fueled by our core values of authenticity, integrity, and drive, we create products our customers love, time and time again. From uniquely styled jeans, pants, and shorts to on-trend shirts and jackets, our movement-inspired innovations, versatile styling, and superior fit have inspired generations.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I'm 5'2, 200lb, have wide hip, usually wear size 14 or 14w in jeans.I ordered 16 and it fit me perfectly. The 14 was too tight on my hips.Pro: color is easy to match my clothes, it's loose, loose around my calves which is great for my blood circulation when standing all day at work, although this is meant for mid waisted( I usually wear it under my tummy because of health problems) ( sometimes I wear it mid waisted so my waist look snatched)Can be improved: wish it was a bit shorter because without shoes, I'm cleaning the floor for free

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great fit, ordered a second pair in another wash
reviews.reviewText: Great fit, and flattering. They do stretch out a bit after a long day but reshape after washing. These are quality denim jeans that have held up for some time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cute, butt (haha) with tiny pockets
reviews.reviewText: I purchased these in a size 12 in the color Home Laundered. For sizing reference, I'm usually a medium-large or a 8-12/29-31 in bottoms and jeans. If it helps, I wear a size 6 or 8 in Lulu leggings. I'm 5'3" tall with a short torso, and my measurements are about 44"-33"-44" (bust-waist-hip), give or take.I ended up liking these jeans more than I expected to, so I did keep them. I've been on the hunt for a good pair of non-skinny jeans for a while and have tried on so many at this point. I'm 35 so grew up wearing things like low rise boyfriend fit and flare leg jeans in junior high/high school, but then skinny jeans became more the thing around when I graduated, so that's all I've been wearing forever. It feels really weird to wear wider leg pants again (that aren't slacks) but I have to say, it's so much more comfortable... Anyway.These are a little lower rise than I'd like, but having that room in the legs is great. I played soccer for a while and still have the thick thighs and calfs, and these don't hug them pretty much at all. They're nice and loose. The only real complaint I have is that the back pockets are weirdly small, and the legs are a little long on me, but I'm on the shorter side so expect that. The material is softer and stretchy so they're comfy.Overall, I do like these. I don't think I'd purchase again, but I'll wear this pair at least.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The jeans themselves looked fine however you need to have an hourglass figure. The jeans fit everywhere fine except the waist, It was like a whole another size smaller than the rest of the jeans. And it had absolutely no give or stretch. It has become so difficult to buy jeans online. I brought another brand last month and they fit absolutely perfect in my size, actually they were just a little loose. So I bought the same jean in a different color, when I took it out of the bag and held it up I could see that it was at least two sizes smaller than the the white ones. So it's definitely a game of chance when it comes to ordering jeans.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These are great jeans if you're a curvy girl like me. If you are hourglass or pear shaped... these jeans check all the boxes....relaxed fit in the hip and thighs and super stretchy. I'm 5'4 and the length is about perfect for me. The funny thing is they are advertised as having a rise of 9.5" (mid rise), however I knew that couldn't be true because the waistband came up above my belly button. So I measured the rise and it was 12"! I wasn't mad about it because I love high rise jeans. The only negative I could find about these jeans is they are quite a thin denim material and I question how long they will last, especially after seeing some of the other reviews. But for the low price I paid I'm sure I'll get my money's worth.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My New Favorite Jeans!
reviews.reviewText: I LOVE these jeans. I’m a recent skinny jeans convert- I used to wear exclusively skinny jeans, but I tried these on and I was hooked! They’re breathable, sturdy, and incredibly comfy around the waist and butt areas. They’re flattering as well, and the black color means they go with pretty much everything I own.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars good fit for apple shaped body
reviews.reviewText: I am on the edge of 14/16, and have what I consider larger thighs and calves. 14 fit perfect everywhere but my waist. 16 fit perfect on my waist but still looked ok on the rest of me, baggy but not ridiculously so. Hence if you are a round waist, not an hourglass, order up. Love the thickness, these seem solid and looking forward to wearing them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Excellent, but size up!
reviews.reviewText: According to the Lee size chart, I needed a 14. Their measurements are way different from other size charts; all my other pants are 10s. Anyway, I took a chance on the 14s and they're just what I wanted: a baggier fit, while still fitting well around the waist so I'm not hiking them up. If I wanted a snug fit, size 12 would have been perfect (but none were available). For reference I'm 5'8", about 155 lbs, 32 inch waist, 44 inch hips. These fit perfectly in the waist and hip area, with relaxed legs that get baggy at the knees after wearing all day. I might do 12s next time for a more form-fitting look in the booty region, but the 14s look great on me. I'm taking one star off for the weird size chart that causes confusion, otherwise I can't wait to get a second pair!!
Aunque pedí una talla y me enviaron otra que me quedó super grande, el modelo es bonito claro son de piernas super anchas
The jean is comfortable to ware .

I was so pleasantly surprised when I got used jeans. Because I wasn't really expecting too much. But oh my goodness, do I love them. They are everything I need in so much more. they do run on the larger side. I bought a 00 I think or a zero and they do sit kind of large but honestly I don't mind too much they're one fantastic and the great quality, Honestly, i'd say they are excellent quality. Considering the price they honestly feel like they could cost so much more.

These jeans fit great! I have a curvy figure and these jeans fit well in all areas. Usually jeans fit me well in the hip and thighs but are huge around the waist. These jeans are perfect cut for my body type!
They’re good jeans, just way too high.
